mapper.insert: insert into upload_file ( file_id1, file_id2, file_origin_name, file_extend_name, file_stored_name, file_stored_path, file_from_tab, create_time, creator, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values ( #{fileId1}, #{fileId2}, #{fileOriginName}, #{fileExtendName}, #{fileStoredName}, #{fileStoredPath}, #{fileFromTab}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{attribute1}, #{attribute2}, #{attribute3})
